fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) that uniquely identifies this facility commitment servicing group share transaction.
The Record ID (RID) for the contra lender involved in this transaction.
The amount of the servicing group share.
The amount of the base share after the release of this transaction.  This field is not maintained and should be removed from the database.
The Record ID (RID) of the lender.
The Record ID (RID) for the lender servicing group.
The Record ID (RID) for the facility.
The Record ID (RID) for the pool member (indicating that the lender servicing group is a member of a pool).

The corrected amount of the servicing group share. (Corrections made to released transactions are for documentation purposes only and are reflected on Lender Query but do not affect the actual position of the servicing group in this facility).
The location code that will be reflected on Lender Query.
Indicates whether or not the lender is a host bank.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
